children.text: śivaḥ śaktyā yukto yadi bhavati śaktaḥ prabhavituṃ
na ced evaṃ devo na khalu kuśalaḥ spanditum api
praṇantuṃ stotuṃ vā katham akṛtapuṇyaḥ prabhavati
